
## Scripts Example usage

### run_simulate_seer_crc.py

```
python scripts/run_simulate_seer_crc.py --n 2000 --seed 123 --target_censor_frac 0.30 --out data/simulated_seer_crc.csv --breaks 0,30,60,90,120,150,180,240,300,365,455,545,635,725,815,905,995,1085,1175,1265,1355,1445,1535,1625,1715,1805,1825 --lam 0.0012,0.0011,0.0010,0.0010,0.00095,0.0009,0.00085,0.0008,0.00075,0.0007,0.00065,0.00062,0.00060,0.00058,0.00056,0.00054,0.00052,0.00050,0.00048,0.00046,0.00044,0.00042,0.00040,0.00038,0.00036,0.00034 --beta_num 0.10,0.12,0.18,-0.07
```

### check_simulated_data.py

```
python scripts/check_simulated_data.py --data data/simulated_seer_crc.csv
```

### run_expand_long.py

#### Default breaks grid:

```
python scripts/run_expand_long.py --in_csv data/simulated_seer_crc.csv --out_csv data/dev/simulated_seer_crc_long.csv
```

#### Explicit breaks:

```
python scripts/run_expand_long.py --in_csv data/simulated_seer_crc.csv --out_csv data/dev/simulated_seer_crc_long.csv --breaks 0,30,60,90,120,180,240,300,365,455,545,635,725,815,905,995,1085,1175,1265,1355,1445,1535,1625,1715,1805,1825
```
